title: Fragments, 16th–early 17th century
provenance: from the Richard Cranch Greenleaf Collection.
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Panel of green silk velvet, cut and uncut, on yellow ground; feathered twining foliage forms and bars.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 16th–early 17th century.Medium: silk
Technique: velvet. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-56-46-a,b.
